General.Name: Noram Lithium Corp
General.Description: Noram Lithium Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the United States. Its flagship property is the Zeus Lithium project consisting of 146 placer claims and 136 lode claims covering an area of approximately 1,113 hectares located in Clayton Valley, Nevada. The company was formerly known as Noram Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Noram Lithium Corp. in July 2021. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 555 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N6
